name: Tompi Jones
description: Tompi Jones is a fun platform game in 2.5d inspired in classic platform games. You can play across six worlds between jungles, forests, medieval villages, Aztec pyramids, castles and cemeteries. You must avoid the traps and defeat your enemies with projectile weapons, fighting with the sword or with special items.

reviews.review_text: I really tried to think of at least one appealing/good thing about Tompi Jones but there isn't anything, except that its colorful. The effects and graphics are terrible, it has nonresponsive, horrible controls (I used an xbox 360 controller), ridiculously long loading times(think early ps1), annoying music, and 4 resolution settings with 1080p not included. Fix the darn buggy mess, then maybe I'll try playing again.

I'm sorry, I don't usually write reviews, but this is another game I need to rant about....memory access violation through all three tutorials....can't skip them either even if I wanted to to get to the real stages.....  This game must not be laptop friendly..... or doesn't like mine at least, for some reason. Here, check this  thread  out, I posted on there and never heard back.....from the devs or anyone else with a similar probem like me....yes, I actually patiently waited for a reply thinking maybe, ok I'll give them some time to get back to me, perhaps they're busy now and might reply back in at most a week's time, four months later - no replies; so either the devs are too busy to bother helping me out or this was just cash grab and nothing more...  Waste of my time and money....why did I even bother with this piece of crap.....

Words cannot describe Tompi Jones, you just have to play it to see how bad it is, it is so laughably bad that i did in fact have fun in this game, just not the good fun, it was the bad fun, the fun that you have in the middle of the night when you get bored and you want some easy screenshots to put onto your steam profile, so i give it a 4/10
